main event: A civilian pilot reported a star-like object moving erratically across the sky in San Antonio, Texas on September 18, 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared yellow-white in color and was estimated to be 5-6 times the size of a star.,The object was observed for approximately 6-7 minutes before disappearing.,Radar at Kelly Air Force Base also detected the object.,Witnesses included moonwatchers from Trinity University and additional local observers.,Witnesses did not report any U.S. satellites due over the area at the time of the sighting.
witness description: civilian pilot and moonwatchers from Trinity University
